title: Catalog
description: A complete Catalog in the CHEAP data model, serving as the top-level container for hierarchies and aspects

globalId.description: The globally unique identifier for this catalog entity

uri.description: The URI for this catalog entity; typically a URL

strict.description: Whether this catalog allows new hierarchies and aspect defs to be added

def.description: The catalog definition that describes this catalog's characteristics

upstream.description: The upstream catalog that this catalog derives its data from (null for root catalogs)

hierarchies.description: Directory of hierarchies contained within this catalog, keyed by hierarchy name

aspectDefs.description: All aspect definitions in this catalog, keyed by aspect definition name

aspects.description: Aspect collections organized by aspect definition name

additionalProperties.description: Map of entity UUID to aspect instance for a specific aspect definition
